channel.title: LCS on Dynamics 365 Finance Operations & Power Platform
channel.description: Recent content in LCS on Dynamics 365 Finance Operations & Power Platform

item.title: Getting onebox VHD Dynamics 365 finance and operations virtual machine
item.description: 1. Download Dynamics 365 finance and operations VHD files Go to the LCS main page and select Shared asset library or go to Shared Asset Library. Select the asset type Downloadable VHD. Find the VHD you are looking for based on the desired Finance and Operation version. The VHD is divided into multiple file parts that you need to download. For example, the asset files that start with “VHD - 10.
